atk-s0402a33:2_0: 147-155. Pañcamassa paṭhame yathābhataṁ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito. Dutiye
atk-s0402a33:2_1: sāvajjenāti sadosena. Tatiye visamenāti sapakkhalanena. Samenāti apakkhalanena. Catutthe
atk-s0402a33:2_2: asucināti gūthasadisena aparisuddhena amejjhena. Sucināti parisuddhena mejjhena.
atk-s0402a33:4_0: 156. Dasame sunakkhattantiādīsu yasmiṁ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti, so
atk-s0402a33:4_1: divaso laddhanakkhattayogo nāma, tenassa sadā sunakkhattaṁ nāma hotīti vuccati. Sveva
atk-s0402a33:4_2: divaso katamaṅgalo nāma hoti, tenassa sadā sumaṅgalanti vuccati. Pabhātampissa sadā
atk-s0402a33:4_3: suppabhātameva, sayanato uṭṭhānampi suhuṭṭhitameva, khaṇopi sukkhaṇova, muhuttopi
atk-s0402a33:4_4: sumuhuttova. Ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo kālo khaṇo nāma, tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo
atk-s0402a33:4_5: layo nāma, tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma, tena dasaguṇo muhutto nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_6: tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo. Suyiṭṭhaṁ brahmacārisūti
atk-s0402a33:4_7: yasmiṁ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni, tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṁ suyiṭṭhaṁ
atk-s0402a33:4_8: nāma hoti . Padakkhiṇaṁ kāyakammanti taṁ divasaṁ tena kataṁ kāyakammaṁ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṁ
atk-s0402a33:4_9: nāma hoti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Padakkhiṇāni katvānāti vaḍḍhiyuttāni kāyakammādīni
atk-s0402a33:4_10: katvā. Labhantatthe padakkhiṇeti padakkhiṇe vaḍḍhiattheyeva labhati. Sesaṁ uttānamevāti.
